title: Jennifer Juniper: A journey beyond the muse
description: "Compelling." - The Times"Wise and honest." - Daily MailJenny Boydâ€™s extraordinary life is the stuff of movies and novels, a story of incredible people and places at a pivotal time in the 20th century. As an up-and-coming young model, Jenny found herself at the heart of Carnaby Street in London, immersed in the fashion and pop culture of the Swinging 60s. With boyfriend Mick Fleetwood, sister Pattie Boyd, George Harrison and the rest of the Beatles, she lived the London scene.
author: Jenny Boyd
